name: Normal
eDescription: A normal Enemy, nothing to worry about...

name: Fire
eDescription: This enemy will set you in fire, you'll loose 1 point of life every new turn
hDescription: You're in fire! You loose 1 life point every turn

name: Poison
eDescription: This enemy will poison you, you'll loose 2 points of life every new turn
hDescription: You're poisoned! You loose 2 life points every turn
